name: chatbot-monorepo-runner
description: A script runner for the full chatbot application

scripts.start:notebook: cd ..\Notebook\backend && .\.venv\Scripts\activate.bat && echo --- Starting Notebook Service --- && python app.py
scripts.start:rag: cd server\rag_service && .\.venv\Scripts\activate.bat && echo --- Starting RAG Service --- && python -m rag_service.app
scripts.start:search: cd server\search_service && .\.venv\Scripts\activate.bat && echo --- Starting Search Service --- && python app.py
